question.body: Most organs receive blood ; and return blood .

fill_in_the_blank.choice: from the heart through another organ
through other organs back to the heart

response.feedback: Correct. Most organs receive oxygen-rich blood directly from the heart.
Incorrect. Only the portal system carries blood from one organ to another before returning to venous flow.
Incorrect. Only the heart (left atrium) receives blood directly from the lungs.
Incorrect. Return oxygen-poor blood directly to the heart without passing the blood through another organ.
Correct. Return oxygen-poor blood directly to the heart without passing the blood through another organ.
